verses.text: There \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Nicodemus|strong="G3530"\w*, a \w ruler|strong="G0758"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*:

The \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* by \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Rabbi|strong="G4461"\w*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w art|strong="G2064"\w* a \w teacher|strong="G1320"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w doest|strong="G4160"\w*, \w except|strong="G3361"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Except|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w be born|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w again|strong="G0509"\+w*, he \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w*\+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w see|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w Nicodemus|strong="G3530"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* be \w born|strong="G1080"\w* when he \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w old|strong="G1088"\w*? can \w he|strong="G1410"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* the second \w time|strong="G1208"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother’s|strong="G3384"\w* \w womb|strong="G2836"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w born|strong="G1080"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Except|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w be born|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w water|strong="G5204"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add of\+add* \+w the Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*, \+w he can|strong="G1410"\+w*\+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w That which is born|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the flesh|strong="G4561"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w flesh|strong="G4561"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w that which is born|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Marvel|strong="G2296"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Ye|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w be born|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w again|strong="G0509"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The wind|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w bloweth|strong="G4154"\+w* \+w where|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w it listeth|strong="G2309"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thou hearest|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w the sound|strong="G5456"\+w* \+w thereof|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w canst|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w it cometh|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whither|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w it goeth|strong="G5217"\+w*: \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w one that is born|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*.\wj*

\w Nicodemus|strong="G3530"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Art|strong="G1488"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w a master|strong="G1320"\+w* \+w of Israel|strong="G2474"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w knowest|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w We speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w we do know|strong="G1492"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w testify|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w we have seen|strong="G3708"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w our|strong="G2257"\+w* \+w witness|strong="G3141"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w I have told|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w earthly things|strong="G1919"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*, \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w shall ye believe|strong="G4100"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w I tell|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+add of\+add* \+w heavenly things|strong="G2032"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w hath ascended up|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w came down|strong="G2597"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*, \+add even\+add* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w which is|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w lifted up|strong="G5312"\+w* \+w the serpent|strong="G3789"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the wilderness|strong="G2048"\+w*, \+w even so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w be lifted up|strong="G5312"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w That|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w should|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w perish|strong="G0622"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w eternal|strong="G0166"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w loved|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G5620"\+w* \+w he gave|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w only begotten|strong="G3439"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w should|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w perish|strong="G0622"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w everlasting|strong="G0166"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w condemn|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w through|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w might be saved|strong="G4982"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w He that believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w condemned|strong="G2919"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he that believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w is condemned|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w already|strong="G2235"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he hath|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w believed|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w of the only begotten|strong="G3439"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the condemnation|strong="G2920"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w is come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w loved|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w darkness|strong="G4655"\+w* \+w rather|strong="G3123"\+w* \+w than|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w their|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w deeds|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w were|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G4190"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w one that doeth|strong="G4238"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G5337"\+w* \+w hateth|strong="G3404"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w lest|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w deeds|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w should be reproved|strong="G1651"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he that doeth|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w truth|strong="G0225"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w deeds|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w may be made manifest|strong="G5319"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w they are|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w wrought|strong="G2038"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w After|strong="G3326"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2453"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* he \w tarried|strong="G1304"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w baptizing|strong="G0907"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Ænon|strong="G0137"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w* to \w Salim|strong="G4530"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w came|strong="G3854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* not \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* there \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* a \w question|strong="G2214"\w* \w between|strong="G3326"\w* \add some\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w John’s|strong="G2491"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G3326"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w purifying|strong="G2512"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Rabbi|strong="G4461"\w*, \w he|strong="G3739"\w* that \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* barest \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w behold|strong="G1492"\w*, the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w baptizeth|strong="G0907"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, A \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*, \w except|strong="G3361"\w* it \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w him|strong="G1565"\w*.

He that \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* the \w bride|strong="G3565"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w bridegroom|strong="G3566"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w friend|strong="G5384"\w* of the \w bridegroom|strong="G3566"\w*, which \w standeth|strong="G2476"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w rejoiceth|strong="G5463"\w* \w greatly|strong="G5479"\w* \w because|strong="G1223"\w* of \w the|strong="G5456"\w* \w bridegroom’s|strong="G3566"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*: \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* is \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*.
\w He|strong="G1565"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w increase|strong="G0837"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1691"\w* \add must\add* \w decrease|strong="G1642"\w*.

He that \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* from \w above|strong="G0509"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w above|strong="G1883"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*: he that \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w earthly|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: he that \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w above|strong="G1883"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* he \w testifieth|strong="G3140"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w receiveth|strong="G2983"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w*.

He that hath \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* hath set to his \w seal|strong="G4972"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* the \w words|strong="G4487"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w giveth|strong="G1325"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* \add unto him\add*.

The \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

He that \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* he that believeth \w not|strong="G0544"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w shall|strong="G3700"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.
